response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, encapsulating years of innovation and expertise. We are offering this unique opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. We believe this offers a compelling proposition considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it promises. Should you choose to proceed, we guarantee a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
